mapper.select: select * from post order by uploadDate desc limit #{startIndex}, #{limit}
select count(*) as count from `like` where postId=#{postId}
select contents_pic from post where postId=#{postId}
select count(*) as count from `like` where postId=#{postId} and userId=#{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into post(uploadBy, contents_pic, contents_text, uploadDate) values (#{uploadBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contents_pic, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contents_text, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now());
mapper.delete: delete from `like` where userId=#{userId} and postId=#{postId}
